keyChoices.choiceDescription: If selected, {{ entname }} need to be enabled.
Update display only every two frames instead of every frame, this improves performance.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Scales image the {{ entname }} is displaying.
Target frames per second rendered by this {{ entname }}. Decreasing improves performance.
Minimum render distance in which {{ entname }} is rendering. Leave empty or set to 0 for no minimum distance threshold.
Maximum render distance in which {{ entname }} is rendering. Leave empty or set to 0 for infinite.
Set which textures on this brush are replaced by display.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: All transparent textures, those which names starts with '{' character.
Textures with name specified in "Texture Name" keyvalue below.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Name of the texture to apply display on. Works only when "Texture Mode" is set to 'Named Texture'.
